name: SELF-INSURANCE INSTITUTE OF AMERICA, INC.
description: The client represents the interests of the self-insurance industry.
sampleDescriptions: Discuss issues related to self-insurance industry. Advocate for the enactment of legislation that would protect stop-loss insurance from federal regulation.
